participant_1.background:
I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.
i speak french and english fluently.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I am proud of my ability to get a degree in two years despite my reputation as a slacker.

participant_2.background:
Losing my father was the hardest thing I've ever been through.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.
my favorite band is nickelback.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.
i love horses.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
What are some of your hobbies?
I love watching nature documentaries, and I also love reading.
Nature documentaries are really interesting! I like watching them too. What are some of your favorite ones?
I really liked the one about the great migration of wildebeest. That was really amazing. What are some of your favorite books?
I love reading historical fiction, and I also like reading biographies. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I do enjoy reading historical fiction and biographies too.
That's great! It's always nice to meet someone who loves to read.
It is! It's a great way to learn about new things and explore different worlds.
I totally agree! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I can stay up late reading a good book and not even realize it.
Me too! I'm glad I met you. It's nice to talk to someone who loves to read.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone with similar interests.
